meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Naomi Yavneh Paul Donnelly Michael Rankins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #883.

td.p: Naomi Yavneh, a graduate student and teaching associate from Berkeley, California
Paul Donnelly, a nanny originally from Alexandria, Virginia
Michael Rankins, a customer service represenative from Rohnert Park, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $33,199)

tr.td: HISTORIC NAMES
SPORTS TRIVIA
LOVE & MARRIAGE
TV JOURNALISTS
COMPOSERS
POLES

"Wop bop a loo bop a lop bom bom! /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Wop bop a loo bop a lop ba ba!..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Singer heard here, he's a bona fide minister who performs wedding ceremonies:
"Wop bop a loo bop a lop bom bom! /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Tutti frutti, oh rutti /
Wop bop a loo bop a lop ba ba!..."
